description: Mistral dashboard to display metrics from Prometheus

panels.description: Mistral cluster status (Up, Degraded, Down)

targets.query: SELECT last("state") FROM "mistral_cluster" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project' ) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral Cluster Status

panels.description: Displays number of completed workflows, tasks and actions per second

targets.query: SELECT difference(last("tasks_success")) FROM "mistral_entities" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("workflows_success")) FROM "mistral_entities" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("actions_success")) FROM "mistral_entities" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Completion speed per sec

panels.description: Displays amount of memory requested by Mistral pods, memory usage and limit

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory/usage" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" ='$project'  AND "pod_name" =~ /^(mistral-api|mistral-executor|mistral-engine|mistral-event-engine|mistral-notifier|mistral-monitoring|monitoring-agent)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(none)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory/limit" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" ='$project'  AND "pod_name" =~ /^(mistral-api|mistral-executor|mistral-engine|mistral-event-engine|mistral-notifier|mistral-monitoring|monitoring-agent)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(none)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory/request" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" ='$project'  AND "pod_name" =~ /^(mistral-api|mistral-executor|mistral-engine|mistral-event-engine|mistral-notifier|mistral-monitoring|monitoring-agent)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(none)

panels.title: MEM Usage Summary

panels.description: Version of using opensource Mistral

targets.query: SELECT last("state") FROM "mistral_cluster" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project' ) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral Opensource version

panels.description: Displays Mistral Maintenance mode status

targets.query: SELECT last("status") FROM "mistral_maintenance" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project' ) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Maintenance status

panels.description: Displays number of tasks in non-terminal state

targets.query: SELECT mean("tasks_running") + mean("tasks_waiting") FROM "mistral_entities" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Tasks in non-terminal state

panels.description: Displays amount of cores requested by Mistral pods, cores usage and limit

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" ='$project'  AND "pod_name" =~ /^(mistral-api|mistral-executor|mistral-engine|mistral-event-engine|mistral-notifier|mistral-monitoring|monitoring-agent)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(none)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/limit" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" ='$project'  AND "pod_name" =~ /^(mistral-api|mistral-executor|mistral-engine|mistral-event-engine|mistral-notifier|mistral-monitoring|monitoring-agent)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(none)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/request" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" ='$project' AND "pod_name" =~ /^(mistral-api|mistral-executor|mistral-engine|mistral-event-engine|mistral-notifier|mistral-monitoring|monitoring-agent)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(none)

panels.title: CPU Usage Summary

panels.description: Displays Mistral E2E smoke test status

targets.query: SELECT last("smoke") FROM "mistral_maintenance" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project') AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral E2E Smoke

panels.description: Mistral API status (Up, Degraded, Down)

targets.query: SELECT last("state") FROM "mistral_apps" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project'  AND "name" =~ /^mistral-api/) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral API Status

panels.description: Mistral executor status (Up, Degraded, Down)

targets.query: SELECT last("state") FROM "mistral_apps" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project'  AND "name" =~ /^mistral-executor/) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral Executor Status

panels.description: Mistral engine status (Up, Degraded, Down)

targets.query: SELECT last("state") FROM "mistral_apps" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project'  AND "name" =~ /^mistral-engine/) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral Engine Status

panels.description: Mistral notifier status (Up, Degraded, Down)

targets.query: SELECT last("state") FROM "mistral_apps" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project'  AND "name" =~ /^mistral-notifier/) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral Notifier Status

panels.description: Mistral monitoring status (Up, Degraded, Down)

targets.query: SELECT last("state") FROM "mistral_apps" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project'  AND "name" =~ /^mistral-monitoring/) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral Monitoring Status

panels.description: Displays current number of available Mistral API pods.

targets.query: SELECT last("available_replicas") FROM "mistral_apps" WHERE ("name" =~ /^mistral-api/ AND "namespace" ='$project' ) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral API pods

panels.description: Displays current number of available Mistral Executor pods.

targets.query: SELECT last("available_replicas") FROM "mistral_apps" WHERE ("name" =~ /^mistral-executor/ AND "namespace" ='$project' ) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral Executor pods

panels.description: Displays current number of available Mistral Engine pods.

targets.query: SELECT last("available_replicas") FROM "mistral_apps" WHERE ("name" =~ /^mistral-engine/ AND "namespace" ='$project' ) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral Engine pods

panels.description: Displays current number of available Mistral Notifier pods.

targets.query: SELECT last("available_replicas") FROM "mistral_apps" WHERE ("name" =~ /^mistral-notifier/ AND "namespace" ='$project' ) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral Notifier pods

panels.description: Displays current number of available Mistral Monitoring pods.

targets.query: SELECT last("available_replicas") FROM "mistral_apps" WHERE ("name" =~ /^mistral-monitoring/ AND "namespace" ='$project' ) AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: Mistral Monitoring pods

panels.description: Displays workflows count by state

targets.query: SELECT last("workflows_running") FROM "mistral_entities" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Workflow count by state

panels.description: Displays tasks count by state

targets.query: SELECT last("tasks_running") FROM "mistral_entities" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Task count by state

panels.description: Displays delayed calls count by target

targets.query: SELECT last("delayed_calls_mistral.engine.policies._complete_task") FROM "mistral_entities" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("delayed_calls_mistral.services.maintenance._resume_executions") FROM "mistral_entities" WHERE ("namespace"='$project') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Delayed calls count by target

panels.description: Displays actions count by state

targets.query: SELECT last("actions_running") FROM "mistral_entities" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("actions_success") FROM "mistral_entities" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Action count by state

panels.description: Displays Mistral Engine CPU usage (in cores),  CPU limit and CPU requested for each engine pod

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" ='$project' AND "pod_name" =~ /^mistral-engine/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(linear)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/limit" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" ='$project'  AND "pod_name" =~ /^mistral-engine/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(linear)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/request" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" ='$project'  AND "pod_name" =~ /^mistral-engine/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(linear)

panels.title: Mistral Engine CPU Usage

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name"='$project'  AND "pod_name" =~ /^mistral-api/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(linear)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/limit" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" ='$project'  AND "pod_name" =~ /^mistral-api/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(linear)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/request" WHERE ("type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name"='$project'  AND "pod_name" =~ /^mistral-api/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(linear)

panels.title: Mistral Engine MEM Usage

panels.description: Displays Mistral Executor memory usage (in MiB),  memory limit and memory requested for each Executor pod

panels.description: RabbitMQ status (Up, Down)

targets.query: SELECT last("state") FROM "rabbitmq_status" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project') AND time >= now() - 2m

panels.title: RabbitMQ Status

panels.description: Displays number of messages in Mistral engine queue

targets.query: SELECT mean("messages_count") FROM "rabbitmq_queues" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project' AND "name" = '_mistral_engine') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Mistral Engine Messages Count

panels.description: Displays number of messages in Mistral executor queue

targets.query: SELECT mean("messages_count") FROM "rabbitmq_queues" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project' AND "name" = '_mistral_executor') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Mistral Executor Messages Count

panels.description: Displays number of messages in Mistral notifier queue

targets.query: SELECT mean("messages_count") FROM "rabbitmq_queues" WHERE ("namespace" ='$project' AND "name" = '_mistral_notifier') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Mistral Notifier Messages Count

title: Mistral Overview
